      • getInstance

      • read

        public java.lang.String read(java.lang.String pictureToRead)
        Reads content of QR code on desired location
        Parameters:
        pictureToRead - path to QR code
        Returns:
        QR code text or error message

      • write

        public int write(java.lang.String textToWrite,
        java.lang.String saveLocation,
        int dimensions,
        java.lang.String format)
        Creates QR code out of desired text on desired location with given width and height with selected file extension (png, jpg, jpeg or gif)
        Parameters:
        textToWrite - text for transforming to QR code
        saveLocation - absolute path to location on which QR code will be saved
        dimensions - width and height of QR code
        format - file extension of picture containing QR code (png, jpg, jpeg, gif)
        Returns:
        0 if writing was successful, otherwise -1
